text: Barind Multipurpose Development Authority () is a Bangladesh government development authority under the Ministry of Agriculture responsible for development of Barind Tract. Dr. Akram H. Chowdhury is Chairman of the authority. ==History== Barind Integrated Area Development Project was established in 1985 to develop the Barind Tract under the authority of Bangladesh Agricultural Development Corporation. The project was completed in 1990 and had only used 26 percent of its original budget. On 15 June 1992 the project was reconstituted as the Barind Multipurpose Development Authority under the Ministry of Agriculture. ==References== Category:1992 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government agencies of Bangladesh Category:Government departments of Bangladesh
title: Barind Multipurpose Development Authority
